CustomField.formula:
IF(Estimated_of_Buyers__c >= 250 && Estimated_of_Buyers__c <5000 && Assortment_Prio__c="TOP", 1, IF( Estimated_of_Buyers__c >0 && Estimated_of_Buyers__c < 250 && Assortment_Prio__c="TOP", 2, IF( Estimated_of_Buyers__c >= 250 && Estimated_of_Buyers__c <5000 && Assortment_Prio__c="MEDIUM", 2, IF( Estimated_of_Buyers__c >=5000 && Assortment_Prio__c="TOP", 3, IF( Estimated_of_Buyers__c >0 && Estimated_of_Buyers__c < 250 && Assortment_Prio__c="MEDIUM", 3, IF( Estimated_of_Buyers__c >= 250 && Estimated_of_Buyers__c<5000 && Assortment_Prio__c="LOW", 3, IF( TEXT(Estimated_of_Buyers__c)="0" || ISBLANK(TEXT(Assortment__c)), 0, 4 )
) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Tiering
